title: Bug 114905 - Default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value. Steps to reproduce: 1. New a report parameter, set Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5.
OB: When modifying the default value of a list box report parameter, the new default value is not retained.
EB: After modifying the default value of a list box report parameter, the new default value should be saved and displayed.
SR: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value, then click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. The default value should be 'aaa' and it should be retained even after reopening the dialog.
